content: I might be a few minutes late!
@nikomatsakis It looks like Zoom won't let the meeting start without you. ;)
we probably should upgrade our zoom account to let, at the very least, either of the leads to initiate meetings.
(do either of you have any notion of what that might cost? I haven’t look into that tier of zoom myself…)
I think it costs a bit of experimentation with better meeting software. ;)

(i don't know if this setting if available on your account, but my work zoom account as a "allow participants to join anytime" setting that i think will do what you want. you also have to disable the waiting room)
I have the impression that nikomatsakis has done that, but it doesn't seem to take effect?
Very interesting post, @Taylor Cramer, thx
